doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Ashraf Ul Huq Kazal
doctor.degree: MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FICS, EMSB (Australia), PhD, FACS
doctor.specialty: Pediatric Surgeon, Pediatric Urologist, Laparoscopic Surgeon & Intersex specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Ashraf Ul Huq Kazal is a Pediatric Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FICS, EMSB (Australia), PhD, FACS. He is a Professor & Head, Pediatric Surgery at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Ashraf Ul Huq Kazal at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka is 3pm to 5pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

chamber.address: 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak (Green Road), Dhanmondi, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mohammed Shadrul Alam
doctor.degree: MBBS, MS, EMHE (DU), FSPU, FCPS, FRCS, FACS (USA)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mohammed Shadrul Alam is a highly qualified Pediatric Urologist and Surgeon with extensive expertise in child urology. He holds multiple prestigious degrees, including MBBS, MS, EMHE (DU), FSPU, FCPS, FRCS, and FACS (USA). He is a Fellow in Pediatric Urology from the USA and India (WHO Fellow), and currently serves as the Professor & Head of the Pediatric Surgery Department at Mugda Medical College & Hospital. For consultations, Dr. Alam sees patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, from 4:00 PM to 6:30 PM (Saturday to Thursday) and from 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM on Fridays. He specializes in treating various pediatric urological conditions such as urinary tract infections, kidney stones, and bladder disorders in children.

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam
doctor.specialty: Pediatric Surgeon, Pediatric Urologist & Laparoscopic Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam is a Pediatric Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FICS (USA), FRCS (UK). He is a Senior Consultant, Pediatric Surgery at Square Hospital, Dhaka. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Square Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam at Square Hospital, Dhaka is 11am to 1pm & 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 8/F, Kazi Nuruzzaman Road, West Panthapath, Dhaka

doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Kamal M. Choudhury is a Pediatric Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FACS, Fellow Pediatric Urology (Australia). Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Kamal M. Choudhury at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Shahid Karim at Evercare Hospital, Dhaka is 9am to 5pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Zahid Hossain
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Zahid Hossain is a Pediatric Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Professor of Pediatric Surgery at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Samorita Hospital Ltd, Panthapath. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Zahid Hossain at Samorita Hospital Ltd, Panthapath is 7pm to 9pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. A.K.M Khairul Basher
doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M Khairul Basher is a highly skilled pediatric urologist and pediatric surgeon specializing in the treatment of congenital and acquired urological disorders in children. With an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS in Pediatric Surgery from BSMMU, he has extensive experience in managing complex surgical cases in infants and children. As an Assistant Professor of Pediatric Urology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he is dedicated to providing advanced surgical care. Dr. Basher specializes in treating conditions such as hypospadias, undescended testes, vesicoureteral reflux, hydronephrosis, pediatric hernias, and congenital urinary tract abnormalities. He consults at Comfort Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, offering expert care for young patients. Book an appointment today for specialized pediatric surgical and urological treatment.

chamber.address: Comfort Doctors’ Chamber 3, Green Road, Dhaka
